sen.j: 天塚古墳（あまづかこふん）は、京都府京都市右京区太秦松本町にある古墳。
sen.e: Amazuka-kofun Tumulus is a kofun (tumulus) at Uzumasa Matsumoto-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Amazuka-kofun Tumulus is a kofun (tumulus) at Uzumasa Matsumoto-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Amazuka-kofun Tumulus is a kofun (tumulus) at Uzumasa Matsumoto-cho, Ukyo Ward, Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: ふたつの横穴式石室をもつ前方後円墳である。
sen.e: It is a large keyhole-shaped tomb mound with two horizontal stone chambers.
It is a large keyhole-shaped tomb mound with two horizontal stone chambers.
It is a large keyhole-shaped tomb mound with two horizontal stone chambers.

sen.j: 国の史跡に指定されている。
sen.e: It has been designated as the state's historic site.
It has been designated as a state historic site.
It has been designated as a state historic site.

sen.j: 京都市内の古墳の中では蛇塚古墳に次ぐ規模を誇る。
sen.e: It is the second largest kofun after Hebizuka-kofun Tumulus among kofuns in Kyoto city.
It is the second largest kofun after Hebizuka-kofun Tumulus among kofuns in Kyoto city.
It is the second largest kofun after Hebizuka-kofun Tumulus among kofuns in Kyoto city.

sen.j: 中央部と前方部の2カ所にくびれがあるのが特徴である。
sen.e: It features two narrowest parts: one in the center part and the other in the front part.
It features two narrowest parts: one in the center part and the other in the front part.
It features two narrowest parts: one in the center part and the other in the front part.

sen.j: 1887年に発掘され、鉄轡や鉄製馬具の破片、銅鏡、勾玉など、400点余りの副葬品が発見された。
sen.e: This kofun was excavated in 1887, and more than four hundreds of funerary goods such as pieces of iron bit and iron harness, bronze mirror, or magadama, a comma-shaped bead were discovered.
This kofun was excavated in 1887, and more than four hundred funerary goods such as pieces of iron bits and iron harnesses, bronze mirrors, and magadama comma-shaped bead were discovered.
This kofun was excavated in 1887, and more than four hundred funerary goods such as pieces of iron bits and iron harnesses, bronze mirrors, and magadama comma-shaped bead were discovered.

sen.j: 近くに清水山古墳などがある。
sen.e: There is Shimizuyama-kofun Tumulus nearby.
The Shimizuyama-kofun Tumulus is nearby.
The Shimizuyama-kofun Tumulus is nearby.

sen.j: 秦氏一族の墓と推定されている。
sen.e: The kofun is assumed to be the tomb for the Hata family.
The kofun is assumed to be the tomb for the Hata family.
The kofun is assumed to be the tomb for the Hata family.
